name: Black Sun Priestess

trait.name: Aggressive
text: As a bonus action, the priestess can move up to her speed toward a hostile creature that she can see.

trait.name: Black Sun Sight
text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the the Black Sun priestess' darkvision.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
text: While in bright light, the orc has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The black sun priestess is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The black sun priestess has the following Cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, sacred flame
• 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, cure wounds, detect magic
• 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, bestow curse, spirit guardians

action.name: Greatclub
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

spells: guidance, mending, resistance, sacred flame, bane, command, cure wounds, detect magic, augury, spiritual weapon, animate dead, bestow curse, spirit guardians
